ai-patthana21.37:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.37:0.3_0: Transmigration for those who attack themselves,
ai-patthana21.37:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to repulsion for teaching. You should have no cause or condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.37:2.1_0: Not for the sake of this teaching doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.37:2.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.37:4.1_0: The three, that is not the root, and that is the root of the first,
ai-patthana21.37:5.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to repulsion for the sake of non-decline, because of this that gives rise to the cause.
ai-patthana21.37:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana21.37:6.1_0: one is the cause of greatness ...
